line_2: Near the old YEW in — church-yard.

line_1: THO' here my body lies interr'd,
line_2: I still can be a tell-tale bird;

line_1: He wish'd thus privately to be Interr'd.
line_2: When, at his Death, the humble Man declar'd,
May this my last request be heard,

line_1: To be in Grasmere church interred,
line_2: Poor Kate the death-bell sounding heard,
